snippet: The Susan G. Komen foundation has lent its pink ribbon to an anti-abortion campaign by cutting off financing for breast cancer screenings done by Planned Parenthood.
abstract: Editorial asserts that the Susan G Komen for the Cure foundation has betrayed its mission as a staunch protector of women's health by cutting off its financing of breast cancer screening and education programs run by Planned Parenthood; argues that in addition to harming women, the foundation has also tarnished, perhaps permanently, its brand.
lead_paragraph: The Susan G. Komen foundation has lent its pink ribbon to an anti-abortion campaign by cutting off financing for breast cancer screenings done by Planned Parenthood.

keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure
keywords.name: organizations
